attack.name: Feint Attack
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokemon.

attack.name: Doom News
attack.text: Return all Energy cards attached to Absol [G] to your hand. The Defending Pokemon is Knocked Out at the end of your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Luring Flame
attack.text: Switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. The new Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

attack.name: Vapor Kick
attack.text: If your opponent has any {W} Pokemon in play, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

pokebody.name: Pump Up
pokebody.text: If your opponent has 3 or less Prize cards left, Drifblim [FB] gets +40 HP.

attack.name: Shadow Ball
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. Apply Weakness and Resistance.

attack.name: Dump and Draw
attack.text: Discard up to 2 Energy cards from your hand. Then, draw 2 cards for each Energy card you discarded.

attack.name: Electric Current
attack.text: Move a {L} Energy card attached to Electivire [FB] to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

pokebody.name: Dragon Intimidation
pokebody.text: If Garchomp is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Garchomp is Knocked Out), choose an Energy card attached to the Attacking Pokemon and put it into your opponent's hand.

attack.name: Guard Claw
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Garchomp by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Speed Impact
attack.text: Does 120 damage minus 20 damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

pokepower.name: Evolutionary Flame
pokepower.text: Once during your turn, when you play Magmortar from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may use this power. Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned and Confused.

attack.name: Fire Arrow
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Flame Ball
attack.text: You may move a {R} Energy card attached to Magmortar to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

pokebody.name: Gravitation
pokebody.text: Each Pokemon in play (both yours and your opponent's) gets -20 HP. No more than 20 HP can be reduced by all Gravitation Poke-Bodies.

attack.name: Geo Impact
attack.text: If you have a Stadium card in play, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon that is the same type as the Defending Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Trash Burst
attack.text: You may discard up to 5 Energy cards from your hand. If you do, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card you discarded.

attack.name: Twister
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. If both are tails, this attack does nothing. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Drain Punch
attack.text: Remove from Regigigas [FB] a number of damage counters equal to the amount of Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Rainbow Lariat
attack.text: Does 20 damage times the number of different types of Pokemon SP you have in play.

attack.name: Raging Drill
attack.text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Rhyperior.

attack.name: Deep Scrap
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is Knocked Out by this attack, discard the top 3 cards from your opponent's deck.

attack.name: Quick Attack
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Whirlwind
attack.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

pokebody.name: Root Protector
pokebody.text: Any damage done to Swampert by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon that isn't an Evolved Pokemon is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Drag Off
attack.text: Before doing damage, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and switch it with 1 of the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Push Over
attack.text: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each {F} Energy attached to Swampert.

pokebody.name: Green Aroma
pokebody.text: Remove any Special Conditions from each of your {G} Pokemon. Each of your {G} Pokemon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attack.name: Desperate Pollen
attack.text: If Venusaur already has 8 or more damage counters on it, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned, Confused, and Poisoned.

attack.name: Special Reaction
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by any Special Conditions, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage for each of those Special Conditions.

pokepower.name: Speed Boost
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Yanmega is your Active Pokemon, you may search your discard pile for a {G} Energy card and attach it to Yanmega. This power can't be used if Yanmega is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Wind Return
attack.text: You may return all {G} Energy attached to Yanmega to your hand. If you do, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card you returned.

pokebody.name: Extreme Speed
pokebody.text: Arcanine [G]'s Retreat Cost is {C} less for each {R} Energy attached to Arcanine [G].

attack.name: Overrun
attack.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Sharp Beak
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Ice Beam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

pokebody.name: Compound Eyes
pokebody.text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has any Poke-Bodies, each of Butterfree [FB]'s attacks does 30 more damage to the Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Select Powder
attack.text: Choose either Burned or Poisoned. The Defending Pokemon is now affected by that Special Condition.

attack.name: Moving Fire
attack.text: You may move a {R} Energy card attached to 1 of your Benched Pokemon to Camerupt.

attack.name: Volcanic Crash
attack.text: Flip 3 coins. For each tails, discard the top card of your deck. Ignore this effect if your opponent has any {W}

attack.name: Searing Flame
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

attack.name: Earth Power
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Flame Jet
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Heal Bell
attack.text: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Pokemon.

attack.name: Super Psywave
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. Count the amount of Energy attached to that Pokemon. Put that many damage counters on the Pokemon.

attack.name: Antique Magic
attack.text: Put 3 damage counters on any Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's) in any way you like.

attack.name: Synchro Attack
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon has the same remaining HP as Claydol, this attack's base damage is 90 instead of 30.

attack.name: Smash Turn
attack.text: You may switch Crawdaunt [G] with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Hyper Beam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

pokebody.name: Thick Fat
pokebody.text: Any damage done to Dewgong by attacks from {R} Pokemon and {W} Pokemon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Ice Throw
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is a {F} Pokemon, this attack's base damage is 80 instead of 30.

pokepower.name: Echo Draw
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. This power can't be used if Dodrio is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Ghost Hand
attack.text: Put 1 damage counter on 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Cursed Wrath
attack.text: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokemon SP in your discard pile.

attack.name: Rushing Water
attack.text: Move an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon to another of your opponent's Pokemon.

attack.name: Escort
attack.text: If you played any Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

pokebody.name: Erasing Sound
pokebody.text: Each of your Pokemon has no Weakness.

attack.name: Knock Back
attack.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Hyper Beam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

pokepower.name: Darkness Restore
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Honchkrow is your Active Pokemon, you may use this power. If your opponent's Bench isn't full, search your opponent's discard pile for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto his or her Bench. This power can't be used if Honchkrow is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Riot
attack.text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Pokemon that isn't an Evolved Pokemon in play (both yours and your opponent's).

attack.name: Licking-licking Heal
attack.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon. Then, remove 2 damage counters from that Pokemon.

attack.name: Return
attack.text: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attack.name: Mid-air Strike
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

pokebody.name: Marvel Eyes
pokebody.text: If you have Solrock in play, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to your Lunatone or Solrock by your opponent's Pokemon LV.X.

attack.name: Gravity Wave
Turnaround Standby
attack.text: During your next turn, any damage done by Mawile's Swallow or Bite to your opponent's Active Pokemon is increased by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Swallow
attack.text: Remove from Mawile the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Channeling
attack.text: Your opponent draws 2 cards.

attack.name: Chakra Points
attack.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each card in your opponent's hand.

attack.name: Aqua Tail
attack.text: Flip a coin for each {W} Energy attached to Milotic [C]. This attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attack.name: Wrap
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Sky Attack
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

pokebody.name: Focus Wall
pokebody.text: If Mr. Mime would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack that does 70 or more damage (after applying Weakness and Resistance), Mr. Mime is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

attack.name: Desperate Slap
attack.text: If Mr. Mime has 5 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.

attack.name: Nutritional Support
attack.text: Search your deck for up to 2 {G} Energy cards and attach them to any of your Pokémon in any way you like.Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Hibernation Spore
attack.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. Flip 2 coins instead of 1 between turns. If either of them is tails, the Defending Pokémon is still Asleep.

attack.name: Top Drop
attack.text: Discard the top card from your opponent's deck. If you discarded a Pokemon, this attack does damage equal to the HP of that Pokemon.

attack.name: Brick Break
attack.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

pokebody.name: Natural Cure
pokebody.text: When you attach an Energy card from your hand to Roserade [C], remove all Special Conditions from Roserade [C].

attack.name: Magical Leaf
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and remove 2 damage counters from Roserade [C].

attack.name: Astonish
attack.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at that card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

pokepower.name: Bore Down
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose as many {F} Energy cards as you like, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Sandslash is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Needle
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

attack.name: Horn Pierce
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

attack.name: Endure
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, if Seaking would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, Seaking is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

pokebody.name: Marvel Shell
pokebody.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Shedinja by your opponent's Pokemon that has any Poke-Powers or Poke-Bodies.

attack.name: Spike Wound
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

pokepower.name: Sunshine Fate
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Lunatone in play, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order. This power can't be used if Solrock is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Luna Turn
attack.text: If Lunatone is in your discard pile, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage. Then, search your discard pile for Lunatone, show it to your opponent, and shuffle it into your deck.

attack.name: Synchro Removal
attack.text: If any Energy card attached to Spinda is the same type as any Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon, discard 1 of those Energy cards from the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Pulled Punch
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 10 instead of 30.

attack.name: Rest
attack.text: Remove all Special Conditions and 4 damage counters from Wailord. Wailord is now Asleep.

attack.name: Giant Wave
attack.text: Wailord can't use Giant Wave during your next turn.

attack.name: Lightning Wing
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Sing
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Sonic Wing
attack.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attack.name: Overrun
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Tail Rap
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Hover Up
attack.text: The Retreat Cost for the Defending Pokemon is 0 until the end of your next turn.

attack.name: Crash Bomber
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Special Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage. Then, discard a Special Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Swallow
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove from Carnivine the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon.

pokepower.name: Disrupting Spy
pokepower.text: Once during your turn, when you put Chatot [G] from your hand onto your Bench, you may look at the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck. Put them back on top of your opponent's deck in any order.

attack.name: Search and Escape
attack.text: Search your deck for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put Chatot [G] and all cards attached to it on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Petal Dance
attack.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. Cherrim is now Confused.

attack.name: Mach Blow
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Pokemon SP, this attack's base damage is 80 instead of 20.

attack.name: Giant Tail
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attack.name: Jet Screw
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Healing Scale
attack.text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon.

attack.name: Sand Tomb
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Earthquake
attack.text: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Double Headbutt
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

pokepower.name: Evolutionary Pollen
pokepower.text: Once during your turn, when you play Ivysaur from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may use this power. Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Ice Beam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Smokescreen
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attack.name: Fireworks
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a {R} Energy attached to Magmar.

attack.name: Energy Absorption
attack.text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 Energy cards and attach them to Manectric [G].

attack.name: Thunder Fang
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

pokepower.name: Plunge
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Marshtomp is on your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, move all Energy cards attached to your Active Pokemon to Marshtomp. If you do, switch Marshtomp with that Active Pokemon.

pokebody.name: Intimidating Pattern
pokebody.text: As long as Masquerain is your Active Pokemon, any damage done by an opponent's attack is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Skim Attack
attack.text: Draw 2 cards.

pokebody.name: Metallic Lift
pokebody.text: If Metang has any {M} Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Metang is 0.

attack.name: Psychic
attack.text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Clearing
attack.text: You may discard 2 cards from your hand. If you do, remove 4 damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon.

attack.name: Scale Blow
attack.text: Does 90 damage minus 10 damage for each card in your hand.

attack.name: Call for Family
attack.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic {L} Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Trash Charge
attack.text: Search your discard pile for a {L} Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon.

attack.name: Switcheroo
attack.text: Move a Pokemon Tool card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon to another of your opponent's Pokemon (excluding Pokemon that already has a Pokemon Tool attached to it). (If an effect of this attack is prevented, this attack does nothing.)

attack.name: Circling Dive
attack.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Switch Ninjask with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Parallel Drain
attack.text: Remove from 1 of your Pokemon the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the

attack.name: Draw In
attack.text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 {R} Energy cards and attach them to Numel.

attack.name: Gripthrow
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent returns the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to it to his or her hand.

attack.name: Sever
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Stage 2 Pokemon, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

attack.name: Greedy Draw
attack.text: If you have the same number of cards or less in your hand as your opponent, draw cards until you have 1 more card than your opponent. (If you have more cards in your hand than your opponent, this attack does nothing.)

attack.name: Hand Charge
attack.text: Attach a {L} Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.

attack.name: Quick Attack
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.

attack.name: Gigashock
attack.text: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Find
attack.text: Search your discard pile for a Trainer card or a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

attack.name: Biting Fang
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Ground Swell
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon for each Pokemon Tool card and Stadium card your opponent has in play. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Amnesia
attack.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Fury Attack
attack.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Rock Tumble
attack.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attack.name: Poison Seed
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Discharge
attack.text: Discard all {L} Energy attached to Rotom. Flip a coin for each Energy card you discarded. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Uproar
attack.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Silver Feather
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, when your opponent puts a Basic Pokemon from his or her hand onto his or her Bench, put 2 damage counters on that Pokemon.

attack.name: Metal Max
attack.text: Discard all {M} Energy attached to Skarmory [FB] . Flip a coin for each Energy card you discarded. This attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage for each heads.

attack.name: Sharpshooting
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Lock Up
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Double Peck
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Air Crash
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Collect
attack.text: Draw a card.

attack.name: Reckless Charge
attack.text: Togekiss [C] does 10 damage to itself.

attack.name: Hydro Pump
attack.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to Wailmer but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

attack.name: Take Down
attack.text: Wailmer does 20 damage to itself.

attack.name: Supersonic
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attack.name: Air Slash
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to Yanma.

attack.name: Quick Turn
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Pit Search
attack.text: Search your deck for a Stadium card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck

attack.name: Whimsy Tackle
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attack.name: Bounce
attack.text: Switch Buneary with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Mini Drain
attack.text: Remove 1 damage counter from Buneary.

attack.name: Call for Family
attack.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Nosedive
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Chatot does 10 damage to itself.

attack.name: Growth
attack.text: Attach a {G} Energy card from your hand to Cherubi.

attack.name: Jump On
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

pokepower.name: Baby Evolution
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Chimecho from your hand onto Chingling (this counts as evolving Chingling) and remove all damage counters from Chingling.

attack.name: Chime
attack.text: Search your opponent's discard pile for a Supporter card and use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack. (The Supporter card remains in your opponent's discard pile.)

attack.name: Nap
attack.text: Remove 2 damage counters from Combee.

attack.name: Sharp Pincers
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Take Down
attack.text: Doduo does 10 damage to itself.

attack.name: Reckless Charge
attack.text: Drifloon does 10 damage to itself.

attack.name: Collect
attack.text: Draw a card.

attack.name: Surprise Attack
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attack.name: Count and Draw
attack.text: Draw a card for each of your opponent's Pokemon that isn't an Evolved Pokemon.

attack.name: Focus Fist
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attack.name: Sand Attack
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attack.name: Flail
attack.text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Goldeen.

attack.name: Fury Attack
attack.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Fireworks
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a {R} Energy attached to Growlithe.

attack.name: Flail Around
attack.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Quick Attack
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Extra Punch
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Pokemon LV.X, this attack does 10 damage plus 50 more damage.

attack.name: Karate Chop
attack.text: Does 30 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Meditite.

attack.name: Double Kick
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

pokepower.name: Baby Evolution
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Mr. Mime from your hand onto Mime Jr. (this counts as evolving Mime Jr.) and remove all damage counters from Mime Jr.

attack.name: Encore
attack.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can use only that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Mud Sport
attack.text: If Mudkip has less Energy attached to it than the Defending Pokemon, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Call for Family
attack.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Dash Attack
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Pachi
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Spore
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Stomp
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Thundershock
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Stomp
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Spit Poison
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Icy Wind
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Stun Spore
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Poison Sting
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Tail Smash
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attack.name: Quick Attack
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Stomp
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Tone-Deaf
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attack.name: Quick Turn
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

stadium.text: Whenever any player plays any Pokémon from his or her hand to level up 1 of his or her Pokémon, remove 4 damage counters from that Pokémon.
The Retreat Cost for each Pokémon SP (both yours and your opponent's) is {C} less.

supporter.text: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Flip 2 coins. If either of them is heads, look at your opponent's hand. For each heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand and put it on the bottom of your opponent's deck in any order.

trainer.text: Flip a coin. If heads, put all cards in your hand on top of your deck. Then, search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

supporter.text: Search your discard pile for up to 5 in any combination of Pokémon and basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

trainer.text: Search your discard pile for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

attack.name: Darkness Slugger
attack.text: You may discard a card from your hand. If you do, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

attack.name: Jet Shoot
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Blaziken [FB] by attacks is increased by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Malevolent Fire
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Energy attached to Charizard [G].

attack.name: Powerful Spark
attack.text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your Pokemon.

attack.name: Dragon Rush
attack.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Garchomp [C]. Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 80 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Garchomp [C] can't use Dragon Rush during your next turn.

attack.name: Final Blowup
attack.text: Discard all Energy attached to Rayquaza [C]. Ignore this effect if you have no cards in your hand.

attack.name: Defog
attack.text: Before doing damage, you may discard a Stadium card in play. If you do, this attack's base damage is 70 instead of 40.

attack.name: Diamond Dust
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Hyper Flame
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a {R} Energy attached to Moltres. If tails, discard all Energy attached to Moltres.

attack.name: Lightning Burn
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) If tails, Zapdos does 30 damage to itself.

pokebody.name: Aqua Mirage
pokebody.text: If you have no cards in your hand, prevent all damage done to Milotic by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon.

attack.name: Dwindling Wave
attack.text: Does 80 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Milotic.

attack.name: Deep Sea Pressure
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost is {C}{C} more.

attack.name: Aqua Wave
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

attack.name: Sonicboom
attack.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attack.name: Baton Pass
attack.text: You may switch Yanma with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you do, move as many Energy cards attached to Yanma as you like to the new Active Pokemon.
